segments.text: It's a fine day today , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is.It ' s wonderful after the downpour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How nice seeing the sun back again ! The air is so fresh .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope it stays nice like this for a long period of time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the weather is so unpredictable this time of year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right.We don't know what is going to be like tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look ! It looks as if it is going to rain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The weatherman predicts a fine day today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The weather is often quite different from the weather forecast .
segments.speaker: S1
